S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-3288: Fix optimizer dependency tracking logic so that it correctly enforces join order dependencies between Optimizables, even when plan "short-circuiting" occurs. This patch also fixes a bug in FromVTI's referenced table map (which affects dependencies) and does a slight refactoring of the "pull Optimizable" code for the sake of clarity. And finally, it adds an appropriate test case to the existing lang/subqueryFlattening.sql test.
